DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , parallel-group study evaluate PK , safety , tolerability two different dose regimen BG00012 24-hour period adult Chinese , Japanese , Caucasian healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 Study Evaluate PK , Safety , Tolerability BG00012 Chinese , Japanese , Caucasian Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose healthy volunteer study provide pharmacokinetic safety data two different dose regimen BG00012 . The study evaluate BG00012 administered 24-hour period . The study conduct male female Chinese , Japanese , Caucasian healthy volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Must give write informed consent authorization require local law All subject must practice effective contraception study willing able continue contraception 30 day last dose study treatment . History clinically significant cardiac , endocrine , hematologic , hepatic , immunologic , metabolic , urologic , pulmonary , neurologic , dermatologic , psychiatric , renal , major disease , determine Investigator . History malignancy ( subject basal cell carcinoma completely excise prior study entry remain eligible ) History severe allergic anaphylactic reaction Known history positive test result Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) Serious infection ( e.g. , pneumonia , septicemia ) within 2 month prior Screening . Female subject pregnant currently breastfeed
